loginModal.title: Telegram didn`t open?
loginModal.text: Scan the QR-code with the device where Telegram is installed.

getTelegramBot.error: Failed to retrieve Telegram bot data.

updateTelegramBotAPIToken.success: You have successfully updated the Telegram bot API-token.
updateTelegramBotAPIToken.error: Failed to update the Telegram bot API-token.

updateTelegramBotPrivate.success_true: You have successfully made the Telegram bot private.
updateTelegramBotPrivate.success_false: You have successfully made the Telegram bot public.
updateTelegramBotPrivate.error_true: Failed to make the Telegram bot private.
updateTelegramBotPrivate.error_false: Failed to make the Telegram bot public.
